items.title: Mistral releases new optical character recognition (OCR) API claiming top performance globally
items.description: Mistral AI enables businesses to extract, analyze and interact with their documents in more intelligent ways.

items.title: Anthropic just launched a new platform that lets everyone in your company collaborate on AI — not just the tech team
items.description: Anthropic launches upgraded Console with team prompt collaboration tools and Claude 3.7 Sonnet's extended thinking controls.

items.title: Peer raises $10.5M for metaverse engine, launches 3D personal planets
items.description: Peer announced today it's raised new funding to build its AI-powered metaverse engine and launched its "personal planets" feature.

items.title: A standard, open framework for building AI agents is coming from Cisco, LangChain and Galileo
items.description: The collective, called AGNTCY, aims to create a standard way for AI agents from different platforms and frameworks to talk to each other.

items.title: Hugging Face co-founder Thomas Wolf just challenged Anthropic CEO’s vision for AI’s future — and the $130 billion industry is taking notice
items.description: Hugging Face co-founder Thomas Wolf challenges Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei's "compressed 21st century" vision, arguing AI systems are building "yes-men...
